item.title: All checked in and ready to go. UTMB starts at 5:45pm local time (8:45am PST for everyone back home). Year 6 around Mont Blanc and I'm still just as excited as the first time. There's something about getting lost in the Alps for 30+ hours that strips away
item.description: All checked in and ready to go. UTMB starts at 5:45pm local time (8:45am PST for everyone back home). Year 6 around Mont Blanc and I'm still just as excited as the first time. There's something about getting lost in the Alps for 30+ hours that strips away

item.title: UTMB pack check: fully loaded. Seems heavy until you remember my Cocodona 250 pack was 12+ pounds and my Arizona Monster 300 pack felt like I was carrying a small refrigerator. They implemented cold weather mandatory gear requirements this year, so I had
item.description: UTMB pack check: fully loaded. Seems heavy until you remember my Cocodona 250 pack was 12+ pounds and my Arizona Monster 300 pack felt like I was carrying a small refrigerator. They implemented cold weather mandatory gear requirements this year, so I had

item.title: Lost 10 pounds and burned 16,000 calories running 106 miles around Mont Blanc. This is the full, unfiltered story of my 6th UTMB finish and by far the hardest conditions I've ever faced. We got stuck in a legitimate blizzard in the Alps. Rained on us for
item.description: Lost 10 pounds and burned 16,000 calories running 106 miles around Mont Blanc. This is the full, unfiltered story of my 6th UTMB finish and by far the hardest conditions I've ever faced. We got stuck in a legitimate blizzard in the Alps. Rained on us for

item.title: My feet hurt so badly. It's not normal but the UTMB course is just so brutal. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #runtok

item.title: End of an era. My last pair of Challenger 7s. These are the same pair I ran Leadville in as well. So two mountain 100 milers and they still look good. I will miss you Challenger 7s. You have been so good to me. Yes, I get sad. But life keeps moving forwar
item.description: End of an era. My last pair of Challenger 7s. These are the same pair I ran Leadville in as well. So two mountain 100 milers and they still look good. I will miss you Challenger 7s. You have been so good to me. Yes, I get sad. But life keeps moving forwar

item.title: Burnt 16,000 calories and lost 10 pounds. This is the short verison, there is a long verison if you want to see more. Ran through France, Italy and Switzerland. 109 miles with 34,000 feet of climbing. Seems easy when it's just a minute long, but it took m
item.description: Burnt 16,000 calories and lost 10 pounds. This is the short verison, there is a long verison if you want to see more. Ran through France, Italy and Switzerland. 109 miles with 34,000 feet of climbing. Seems easy when it's just a minute long, but it took m

item.title: How many toenails will I lose? Over/under is 4 I kicked a million rocks over 108 miles. Ran through pouring rain for 8 straight hours. At one point the entire trail became a literal stream of water flowing down the mountain. Fell hard four times on techn
item.description: How many toenails will I lose? Over/under is 4 I kicked a million rocks over 108 miles. Ran through pouring rain for 8 straight hours. At one point the entire trail became a literal stream of water flowing down the mountain. Fell hard four times on techn

item.title: Mission accomplished. Thanks to everyone who sent positive energy when this seemed impossible. Some people were cheering me on, others were waiting for the spectacular failure. Both groups got to watch, but only one got what they wanted. Crazy Mountain's
item.description: Mission accomplished. Thanks to everyone who sent positive energy when this seemed impossible. Some people were cheering me on, others were waiting for the spectacular failure. Both groups got to watch, but only one got what they wanted. Crazy Mountain's

item.title: What do you get for running 109 miles through France, Italy and Switzerland? a vest. and now I have 6 vests #utmb #runtok
item.description: What do you get for running 109 miles through France, Italy and Switzerland? a vest. and now I have 6 vests #utmb #runtok

item.title: CONSISTENCY not perfection This isn't about talent or genetics. This is about showing up for 20+ years when I didn't feel like it. Running in rain, snow, heat, and cold. Consistency isn't glamorous, it's just refusing to quit. People love to tell runners
item.description: CONSISTENCY not perfection This isn't about talent or genetics. This is about showing up for 20+ years when I didn't feel like it. Running in rain, snow, heat, and cold. Consistency isn't glamorous, it's just refusing to quit. People love to tell runners

item.title: @brianreynoldsrunner Brian Reynolds is redefining what's possible. Double amputee crushing marathons, setting world records, and climbing mountains like Kilimanjaro - taking on challenges that break most able-bodied athletes.While most of us make excuses
item.description: @brianreynoldsrunner Brian Reynolds is redefining what's possible. Double amputee crushing marathons, setting world records, and climbing mountains like Kilimanjaro - taking on challenges that break most able-bodied athletes.While most of us make excuses

item.title: I have failed Moab 240 twice. Third time will be the charm. Most people quit after one failure. Champions use it as fuel. Each attempt at Moab has stripped away another layer of excuses and revealed more about what I'm truly capable of when everything goe
item.description: I have failed Moab 240 twice. Third time will be the charm. Most people quit after one failure. Champions use it as fuel. Each attempt at Moab has stripped away another layer of excuses and revealed more about what I'm truly capable of when everything goe

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
